data.title: Where We Are On TV Report 2022 – 2023
data.meta_description: The Where We Are on TV report analyzes the number of LGBTQ characters on primetime scripted series on broadcast networks, primetime scripted series on cable networks and scripted series on streaming services for the 2022-2023 TV season. This year's report was released in March 2023.Below are some of the most remarkable points GLAAD found in its research
data.meta_site_name: GLAAD | GLAAD rewrites the script for LGBTQ acceptance.
data.text:
The Where We Are on TV report analyzes the number of LGBTQ characters on primetime scripted series on broadcast networks, primetime scripted series on cable networks and scripted series on streaming services for the 2022-2023 TV season. This year’s report was released in March 2023.

Below are some of the most remarkable points GLAAD found in its research this year. Download the full report now to read more.
